sent.orig: Boric acid is used in nickel plating, and would presumably be a constituent of rinse water.
sent.trans: 硼酸用于镀镍，大概也是漂洗液的一个组成部分。

sent.orig: Among them, presumably, are the kinds of discoveries that would add to longevity.
sent.trans: 在未发明的东西中，或许会有可以延长寿命的发明。

sent.orig: Presumably life originated only once, so there was once only living organism of Adamlike oneness.
sent.trans: 假设生命只有一次起源，那么这世界上就一度只有孤零零的生命始祖存在。

sent.orig: A breakdown in the global economic and political system would presumably do it.
sent.trans: 全球经济和政治体系的崩溃也许可以做到这一点。
